name: BluetoothRemoteGATTServer
description: The BluetoothRemoteGATTServer interface of the Web Bluetooth API represents a GATT Server on a remote device.
content:
This is an experimental technology
Check the Browser compatibility table carefully before using this in production.

The BluetoothRemoteGATTServer interface of the Web Bluetooth API represents aGATT Serveron a remote device.

This page describes the W3C Community GroupWeb Bluetooth API. For the Firefox OS Bluetooth API, see BluetoothGattServer (Firefox OS).
